item.title: Marie Osmond - Paper Roses
item.description:
I realize the way
your eyes deceived me
with tender looks that
I mistook for love
So take away
the flowers that
you gave me
And send the kindness
that remind me of
PAPER ROSES
PAPER ROSES
Oh how beautiful
they seemed to be
But they’re only
imitation like
you imitate
your love for me -
I thought that
you would be
a perfect lover
You seemed so full
of sweetness
at the start
But like the sweet
red roses made of paper
There is no steady
sweetness in your heart
PAPER ROSES
PAPER ROSES
Oh how beautiful
they seemed to be
But they’re
only imitation like
you imitate
your love for me -
